messages.message: Iâ€™d find it really helpful for navigation to have Converse and Build as tab options on the AI Hub homepage. I think this could still maintain the concept of the Discover tab being for discovering existing solutions and highlighting features and My Hub being a shortcut to view user-specific info, but would improve visibility and access to the core features.

Maybe in combination with adding the same navigation tabs under the AI Hub sidebar once you click through to Converse/Build. It just makes it easier to navigate around without having to click back to home.
(This is just based on how I conceptualize the AI Hub product and its features, which admittedly may differ from the intended/future architecture)
